project_name: GitWorth - The Student GitHub Profile Analyzer

design_identity.core_concept: A high-performance command center for students. It feels like a 'game HUD' for their career. Dark, precise, electrified.
design_identity.visual_style: Dark Mode Only. High Contrast. Neon Accents on Deep Charcoal. Grid-based structures.

typography.installation_instructions: Import fonts from Google Fonts: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@300;400;500;700&family=Manrope:wght@300;400;500;600;700&display=swap'); Apply via index.css body selector.

usage_rules.headings: Uppercase, tracking-tight, font-bold. Use for Section Titles and Big Metrics.
usage_rules.body: Regular weight, relaxed leading. Use for advice and descriptions.

layout_strategy.spacing_scale: Aggressive. Use gap-8 and p-8 as default for containers. Dense gap-4 for data grids.
layout_strategy.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A) for Landing, High Density (Mode B) for Dashboard.
layout_strategy.border_radius: Rounded-md (6px) for a technical feel. Avoid large pill shapes for containers.

buttons.primary: Solid #CCFF00 text-black, font-mono, uppercase, tracking-wider, sharp corners or slightly rounded (rounded-sm). Hover: Brighten.
buttons.secondary: Border 1px solid #333, bg-transparent, text-white. Hover: bg-white/10.

cards.style: Flat background (bg-card), 1px border (border-border), no shadow. On hover: border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300.

charts.style: Minimalist. Hide grid lines if possible. Use gradients for areas.

inputs.style: bg-secondary/50 border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary height-12 text-lg font-mono placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

visual_enhancers.grid_background: Use a background grid pattern: `bg-[linear-gradient(to_right,#80808012_1px,transparent_1px),linear-gradient(to_bottom,#80808012_1px,transparent_1px)] bg-[size:24px_24px]`
visual_enhancers.glowing_borders: For high-score cards, use a pseudo-element glow or a moving gradient border.
visual_enhancers.ascii_art: Use ASCII art for the 404 page or empty states (e.g., an ASCII trophy for 100% score).

hero_background.usage: Hero Section Background with heavy overlay (bg-black/80).

feature_coding.usage: Landing Page Feature Section - 'How it works'.

motion.hover_effects: Instant color change (duration-150), no bouncy scale effects.
motion.loading_state: Blinking cursor '_' animation instead of spinner.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE `tailwind.config.js`: Replace the existing `colors` object in `theme.extend` with the `tailwind_config_extension.colors` provided above. Ensure `darkMode: 'class'` is preserved.
2. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to `src/index.css` at the very top. Update `body` rule to use `Manrope`. Update `h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6` rules to use `JetBrains Mono`.
3. GLOBAL STYLES: Add the 'grid_background' CSS to the `body` or a global wrapper in `App.css` to give the whole app a texture.
4. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn Card, force `bg-card` and `border-border`. Do not use default white backgrounds.

5. DASHBOARD LAYOUT: Use a CSS Grid for the dashboard: `grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-6`. Place the 'Score' in a large card (`col-span-1 md:col-span-1`), 'Activity' in a wide card (`col-span-2`), and 'Recommendations' in a tall list (`row-span-2`).
6. ICONS: Use `lucide-react` (Code, GitBranch, Star, AlertTriangle, CheckCircle, Terminal).
7. DO NOT use gradients for text. Keep text solid White or Muted Gray for readability.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add `.App { text-align: center; }` in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
